unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Probability Distribution: Everybody Needs a Hero
question_text:
At Burger Bell when someone buys a Hero Meal they receive an action figure. The distribution of action figures is shown in the table below.
Action Figure A B C D
P(x) 0.30 0.10 0.10 0.50


Assuming each Hero Meal is independent of one another, what is the probability when someone buys two Hero Meals they get two of the same action figures?
